name: Daniel Rey Cimafranca
text: Wag naman ganyan, accusation na yan.  It was requested by the government, hindi si Globe may pakana.    Pwede naman yan i adjust balang araw to a lower rate.  Ang importante sa ngayon ang rollout, increased coverage, at pag streamline ng operation.  Hindi naman sila binayaran ng gobyerno para dyan.    Mabuti na ang meron kaysa wala.  Let's be pragmatic about it.  Pwede din naman utangin ang load, just not sure if Globe also offers that.  Karamihan naman ata ng mahirap (in the metros likely) naka Sun so what Sun decides on rate might matter more.
